Hymn.Arabic: يا رب غفرت آثام شعبك. سترت على جميع خطاياهم
Hymn.English: 2 You have forgiven the iniquity of Your people; You have covered all their sin. Selah

Hymn.Arabic: حللت كل رجزك. رجعت عن سخط غضبك هللويا.
Hymn.English: 3 You have taken away all Your wrath; You have turned from the fierceness of Your anger.     Alleluia
